title: Just a few inquisitions
body:
Hey there,

Love the app. Just a few thoughts:

1) can we get the chat to be able to snap outside the app? Like being able to drag the chat box/friends list  to the desktop so when league is minimized you can still see and respond to chats?

2) the ability to buy skins in champ select. And/or gift someone in your lobby?? As long as you don't need anymore RP.

replies.body: We have actually talked about both of those features! Unfortunately that is as far as we've gone, for now. We won't be working on features that are not already available in the legacy client. Once we reach parity we'll begin to work on new features, like the ones you suggested.
I agree, personally I would rather have sound sliders before a seperate chat window.

How about question two. The new champ select removed a lot of existing features such as purchasing skins or wards in champ select. 

Will the new client address these issues players have been complaining about since the release of DQ? 

Or are you only gonna develop stuff which exists in the chanp select and not the past ones.
We didn't remove features. We are building new screens from scratch. We are currently in the alpha phase, that means that you are not seeing a finished product. It is a work in progress.

Sorry I'm on mobile and didn't word my questions well.

As far as I'm aware OPs second question regarding purchasing skins in champ select and gifting skins in the post gsme lobby were once a psrt of the current legacy client .

However with the arrival of DQ these features no longer exist today. are there plans to reintroduce this feature again?

Ie what's the answer to OPs second question :p

It's really hard to phrase thoughts on mobile for me, sorry about the lack of clarity

Purchasing skins and all that stuff we can do on the legacy client will be available, it sounds like. They haven't implemented them yet because they're "building" it "from scratch." That's my understanding.
Thank you for responding and i totally agree. Just threw it out there for later thought. It wont stop me from playing! ðŸ˜Ž
